member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION
member.summary: The NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION structure provides information about a network interface for theOID_GEN_INTERFACE_INFO OID.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifOperStatus
member.summary: The operational status of the interface. This status is the same as the value that theOID_GEN_OPERATIONAL_STATUS OID returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifOperStatusFlags
member.summary: The operational status flags of the interface. This field is reserved for the NDIS proxy interface provider. Other interface providers should set this member to zero.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.MediaConnectState
member.summary: The connection state type.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.MediaDuplexState
member.summary: The media duplex state of the interface. This state is the same as the value that theOID_GEN_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE OID returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifMtu
member.summary: The maximum transmission unit (MTU) of the interface. This MTU is the same as the value that theOID_GEN_MAXIMUM_FRAME_SIZE OID returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifPromiscuousMode
member.summary: A Boolean value that is TRUE if the interface is in promiscuous mode or FALSE if it is not. This value is the same as the value thatOID_GEN_PROMISCUOUS_MODE OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifDeviceWakeUpEnable
member.summary: A Boolean value that is TRUE if the interface supports wake-on-LAN capability and the capability is enabled, or FALSE if it does not.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.XmitLinkSpeed
member.summary: The transmit link speed, in bytes per second, of the interface. This speed is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_XMIT_LINK_SPEED OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.RcvLinkSpeed
member.summary: The receive link speed, in bytes per second, of the interface. This speed is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_RCV_LINK_SPEED OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifLastChange
member.summary: The time that the interface entered its current operational state. This time is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_LAST_CHANGE OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifCounterDiscontinuityTime
member.summary: The time of the last discontinuity of the interface's counters. This time is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_DISCONTINUITY_TIME OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifInUnknownProtos
member.summary: The number of packets that were received through the interface and that were discarded because of an unknown or unsupported protocol. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_UNKNOWN_PROTOS OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifInDiscards
member.summary: The number of inbound packets that were discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_RCV_DISCARDS OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifInErrors
member.summary: The number of inbound packets that contained errors that prevented them from being deliverable to a higher layer protocol. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_RCV_ERROR OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInOctets
member.summary: The total number of bytes that are received on this interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_BYTES_RCV OID returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of directed packets that are received without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_DIRECTED_FRAMES_RCV OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInMulticastPkts
member.summary: The number of multicast/functional packets that are received without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_MULTICAST_FRAMES_RCV OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInBroadcastPkts
member.summary: The number of broadcast packets that are received without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_BROADCAST_FRAMES_RCV OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes that are transmitted without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_BYTES_XMIT OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutUcastPkts
member.summary: The number of directed packets that are transmitted without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_DIRECTED_FRAMES_XMIT OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutMulticastPkts
member.summary: The number of multicast/functional packets that are transmitted without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_MULTICAST_FRAMES_XMIT OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutBroadcastPkts
member.summary: The number of broadcast packets that are transmitted without errors on the interface. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_BROADCAST_FRAMES_XMIT OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifOutErrors
member.summary: The number of packets that the interface fails to transmit. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_XMIT_ERROR OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifOutDiscards
member.summary: The number of packets that the interface discards. This number is the same as the value that anOID_GEN_XMIT_DISCARDS OID query returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInUcastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in directed packets that are received without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_DIRECTED_BYTES_RCV returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInMulticastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in multicast/functional packets that are received without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_MULTICAST_BYTES_RCV returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCInBroadcastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in broadcast packets that are received without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_BROADCAST_BYTES_RCV returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutUcastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in directed packets that are transmitted without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_DIRECTED_BYTES_XMIT returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutMulticastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in multicast/functional packets that are transmitted without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_MULTICAST_BYTES_XMIT returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.ifHCOutBroadcastOctets
member.summary: The number of bytes in broadcast packets that are transmitted without errors. This count is the same value thatOID_GEN_BROADCAST_BYTES_XMIT returns.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.CompartmentId
member.summary: The compartment that the interface belongs to, if the interface provider can provide the ID of the compartment to which the interface belongs. Otherwise, it should return NET_IF_COMPARTMENT_ID_UNSPECIFIED. If the interface provider returns NET_IF_COMPARTMENT_ID_UNSPECIFIED for the compartment ID, NDIS will return the right compartment ID for this interface.

member.name: NDIS_INTERFACE_INFORMATION.SupportedStatistics
member.summary: The supported statistics. For more information, see theSupportedStatistics member of theNDIS_MINIPORT_ADAPTER_GENERAL_ATTRIBUTES structure.
